actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests as the "Sheep Mountain Wilderness".

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests, California, as the Sheep Mountain Wilderness. Stipulates that the management plan for such wilderness authorize the Forest Service to take any action necessary for fire prevention and watershed protection.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Angeles and San Bernardino National Forests as the "Sheep Mountain Wilderness".
